mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO auth_authorization.CAS_ORG ( ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, IS_LEAF, DESCRIPTION, SECONDLEADER, LEADER, HIRES, ORG_ID_PATH, ORG_PATH, ORDERS, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hires,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgIdPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_auth_authorization.CAS_ORG.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE auth_authorization.CAS_ORG
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECONDLEADER = #{secondleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIRES = #{hires,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_ID_PATH = #{orgIdPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_PATH = #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERS = #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
